citation: Proclamation under the Terrorism (Commonwealth Powers) Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Terrorism (Commonwealth Powers) Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Terrorism (Commonwealth Powers) Act 2002 fix 1 January 2003 as the day on which that Act commences.

23 December 2002

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 December 2002

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
